thread.title: Angels hand front office reins to new GM Billy Eppler
thread.title_full: Angels hand front office reins to new GM Billy Eppler

author: JEFF FLETCHER
title: Angels hand front office reins to new GM Billy Eppler
text: Angels hand front office reins to new GM Billy Eppler Oct. 5, 2015 Updated 6:38 p.m. 1 of 13 New Angels GM Billy Eppler, left, shakes the hand of Angels owner Arte Moreno at the end of an introductory news conference at Angel Stadium. LEONARD ORTIZ, STAFF PHOTOGRAPHER 1 of 13 New Angels general manager Billy Eppler fields questions during a news conference at Angel Stadium. LEONARD ORTIZ, STAFF PHOTOGRAPHER 1 of 13 New Angels general manager Billy Eppler, second from right, fields questions during a news conference at Angel Stadium. LEONARD ORTIZ, STAFF PHOTOGRAPHER 1 of 13 New Angels general manager Billy Eppler, center, fields questions during a news conference at Angel Stadium. LEONARD ORTIZ, STAFF PHOTOGRAPHER 1 of 13 New Angels general manager Billy Eppler fields questions during a news conference at Angel Stadium. LEONARD ORTIZ, STAFF PHOTOGRAPHER 1 of 13 New Angels general manager Billy Eppler, left, listens as Angels owner Arte Moreno speaks during a during a news conference at Angel Stadium on Monday. LEONARD ORTIZ, STAFF PHOTOGRAPHER 1 of 13 The Angels introduced new general manager Billy Eppler at a news conference Monday at Angel Stadium. LEONARD ORTIZ, STAFF PHOTOGRAPHER 1 of 13 The Angels introduced new general manager Billy Eppler at a news conference Monday at Angel Stadium. LEONARD ORTIZ, STAFF PHOTOGRAPHER 1 of 13 New Angels general manager Billy Eppler, second from right, fields questions during a news conference at Angel Stadium. LEONARD ORTIZ, STAFF PHOTOGRAPHER 1 of 13 Catherine Eppler, wife of the new Angels GM Billy Eppler, watches as her husband holds a news conference at Angel Stadium announcing his hiring. LEONARD ORTIZ, STAFF PHOTOGRAPHER 1 of 13 Angels manager Mike Scioscia, center, speaks with the media after a news conference at Angel Stadium to announce Billy Eppler as the new general manager of the Angels LEONARD ORTIZ, STAFF PHOTOGRAPHER 1 of 13 New Angels general manager Billy Eppler, right, is interview by CBS2 newscaster Jim Hill after a news conference at Angel Stadium introducing him as the new GM. LEONARD ORTIZ, STAFF PHOTOGRAPHER 1 of 13 Catherine and Billy Eppler pose for a photo following a news conference at Angel Stadium to announce that Billy Eppler was name the new general manager of the Angels. LEONARD ORTIZ, STAFF PHOTOGRAPHER
